description:
In this project i built a chat application, The chat application is equipped with both basic and standard features.
It was to be built into an existing application as an extension to enable its Users communicate
name: Chat Application

description:
This is an interface for managing database applications, It makes the use of the database effortless.
It was especially built for less tech savvy users, so that anyone can manage their data easily without needing
a specialized big data engineer
name: Database Graphical User Interface

description:
In this project we built an Ecommerce store for a client, The application is packed with tons of features including but 
not limited to auto product recommendation, real time currency transformation so that every user shops using their own currency,
automatic debit or credit card enrollment for easy payment
name: Markenite

description:
An application for generating qr codes, its use cases are numerous, from generating qr codes for phone numbers or wifi connections
to qr codes for brand websites
name: Qr code generator
